page.title: 01East Reading-Earley-Woodley
page.content: East Reading is a fairly quiet residential area. It includes some light industry. It is well equipped with{leisure amenities.}It has a sports stadium,parks, 2 swimming pools and a theatre. For{shopping}it has several kinds of food shops arranged in precincts. The{population}is mixed with people from many different nations with different cultures. The main {religions}here are Christianity, Muslim, Hindu and Sikhs. There are 2 mosques,a temple and several Christian churches of different denominations. The place is dominated by Reading {University.}It has 3 main Secondary {schools} with 6th forms. There are also 2 Colleges, 1 Grammar and several Primary schools.{Traffic}is heavy on Wokingham Rd (access to M239 & M4) and London Rd (links with A4 to London).
